entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Runtimes downloaded from Microsoft repos aren't detected by dotnet due to different installation directory #83950
  • Allow the timers created by TimeProvider to communicate if is resettable #83949
    8.0.0
  • Arm64 tests are not run as part of CI #83947
  • AVX-512 throughput improvement opportunties #83946
    8.0.0
  • C++/CLI assemblies are not eligible for crossgen2 #83942
  • [wasm] crash instead of nullref caused by null check elimination #83941
    8.0.0
  • dotnet-counters stuck at "Waiting for initial payload..." for hostfxr-hosted application #83935
  • Quic exception in the guts of making an http request #83932

Closed

  • [Suggestion]: Replace usage of `ThrowHelper` methods for NullReference and OutOfRange Exceptions #83934
  • Can we improve ROS<byte>.ToArray from RVA static? #68103
    8.0.0
  • JIT: OSR is not conservative enough about exposing struct locals #83783
    8.0.0
  • Empty string literals in Marshal.cs #68347
    Future
  • baseservices/threading/regressions/beta1/347011/347011.dll test failed #83929
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed a typo in SpinLock.cs #83953
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Fix Iran time zone test case #83952
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Use Span.CopyTo(Span) in BigInteger's add and subtract #83951
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Renable running Arm64 test cases in CI #83948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unroll SequenceEqual(ref byte, ref byte, nuint) in JIT #83945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • EmptyHandle.MDStreamVersion returns -1 #83944
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Fix the removal of relations added by basic blocks. #83943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade arm64 cross image to Ubuntu 22.04 / llvm-15 #83939
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Smaller static constructor context #83937
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #83936
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add assert.xunit subtree and make it AOT-safe #83933
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Replace empty string literals in Marshal.cs #83928
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Fix recGetStaticFieldCurrentClass #83843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: import entire method for OSR, prune unneeded parts later #83910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete redundant test #83931
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #83899
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] insertion of enabled MSBuild Server by default #81617
  • Ensure kmask registers are marked available #83927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update the hardcoded dotnet-version with channels #83905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Documentation for loading custom files in Blazor. #83925
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Fix ordering of type initialization and stsfld #80485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Proper type name parser for native AOT compiler #83657
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • In Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator targets, respect Optimize property. #82374
    area-Serialization, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • 7.0 Release not taking into account global.json and downgrade to 6 #28959
    Discussion
  • Regression: `dotnet test` hangs for 15 minutes after test run completed on mac and linux #9452
    Discussion

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Blazor] Enable custom icu loading #31446
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add support for new output path format #31454
    untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `SyntaxFacts.IsAttributeTargetSpecifier` only returns true for all global attribute targets #67485

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash in `NullableWalker.LocalState.GetValue(int)` #67486
    Area-Compilers, 17.6

Updated

  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • blazor-samples/7.0/BlazorSample_Server/ - incomplete namespace #47427
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes #47426
  • why fetch api can't get valid response when asp.net core return 401 status #47425

Closed

  • DbContextHealthCheck does not handle exceptions #47074
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: json, mvc, plaintext #47380
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps #47381
  • Perf improvement: json #47422
  • Blazor WASM OIDC Token Response doesn't save custom properties from Token Response #47417

PullRequests

Created

  • Add analyzer/codefixer to use AddAuthorizationBuilder #47428
    area-security, community-contribution

Merged

  • DbContextHealthCheck handles exceptions thrown by CustomTestQuery #47121
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ScrollView not working when inside a VerticalStackLayout #14209
  • error NETSDK1139: The target platform identifier tizen was not recognized. #14206
  • [Android] URL images loaded at runtime disappear after navigating away and back #14205
  • A lot of refreshes will get slower and slower #14204

Closed

  • Library projects targeting net6.0 and UseMaui set to true VSMac project UI properties doesn't work #13674
  • [Bug] XAML Hot Reload change to BindableLayout ItemsSource blanks content #2962

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge main into net8.0 #14170
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️, blocked
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
